document.topic_text: Government - Federal Job Description BAE Systems is seeking a first line functional manager with leadership experience. The manager will be a senior member of the Systems Engineering organization. The position requires the candidate to supervise, lead and develop 10 to 15 Systems Engineers while contributing technically to a program.Managing includes:Development of the engineers assigned to your sectionDay-to-day staffing assignmentsParticipating in the hiring processEvaluation of performanceMentoring of junior engineersEnsuring engineering adhere to company policies and proceduresBAE Systems employs a player-coach model for the Section Manager role. The Section Manager mentors and coaches the other members of the Section while also being an active participant in the development and delivery of systems to our customers. Minimum Education and Experience Bachelor's Degree and 12 years work experience or equivalent experience Bachelor Degree in an Engineering or Scientific Field with 12+ years of experience Active Secret clearance or higher Ability to lead other engineers while interfacing with fellow and more senior managers in the organizationPeople skills with the ability to be a good listener and advocate for your engineersStrong verbal and written communication skillsMotivated, team-oriented individual with strong problem solving abilitiesExperienced across the life cycle of a system (requirements development through post delivery support)Able to develop technical specifications, test procedures and presentationsAble to interface with internal and external customersControl Account Management (CAM) experienceA desire to continuously improve one's skill set Preferred Skills and Education Electrical, Mechanical, Computer Science or Computer Engineering Bachelor's DegreeSystems Engineering Master's DegreeExperience in electro-opticsSupervisory ExperienceAbility to estimate cost and schedules by reviewing a statement of work change request or other documentation related to a new or modified program proposal About BAE Systems Electronic Systems BAE Systems is a premier global defense and security company with approximately 90,000 employees delivering a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and customer support and services. BAE Systems is a premier global defense and security company with approximately 90,000 employees delivering a full range of products and services for air, land and naval forces, as well as advanced electronics, security, information technology solutions and customer support and services.The Electronic Systems (ES) sector spans the commercial and defense electronics markets with a broad portfolio of mission-critical electronic systems, including flight and engine controls; electronic warfare and night vision systems; surveillance and reconnaissance sensors; secure networked communications equipment; geospatial imagery intelligence products and systems; mission management; and power-and energy-management systems. Headquartered in Nashua, New Hampshire, ES employs approximately 13,000 people globally, with engineering and manufacturing functions primarily in the United States, United Kingdom, and Israel.
